Title: George! George Glass!
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Aaron Kaczander, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Erica and Adam follow the lead of Jan from The Brady Bunch (1969) when dealing with relationship problems. Beverly reaches her limit when it comes to dealing with Murray's stubbornness after he causes her to miss the Beach Boys at Live Aid.
